mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.work_department_id AS "workDepartmentId", a.work_kind_id AS "workKindId", a.work_class_id AS "workClassId", a.car_motor_cycle_id AS "carMotorCycleId", a.car_wagon_id AS "carWagonId", a.wp_total_id AS "wpTotalId", a.wp_part_id AS "wpPartId", a.run_time AS "runTime", a.type AS "type", a.description AS "description", a.deal_method AS "dealMethod", a.fault_date AS "faultDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", wd.id AS "wd.id", wd.name AS "wd.name", wk.id AS "wk.id", wk.name AS "wk.name", wc.id AS "wc.id", wc.name AS "wc.name", cmc.id AS "cmc.id", cmc.name AS "cmc.name", cw.id AS "cw.id", cw.name AS "cw.name", wpt.id AS "wpTotal.id", wpt.name AS "wpTotal.name", wpp.id AS "wpPart.id", wpp.name AS "wpPart.name"

LEFT JOIN work_department wd ON wd.id = a.work_department_id LEFT JOIN work_kind wk ON wk.id = a.work_kind_id LEFT JOIN work_class wc ON wc.id = a.work_class_id LEFT JOIN car_motor_cycle cmc ON cmc.id = a.car_motor_cycle_id LEFT JOIN car_wagon cw ON cw.id = a.car_wagon_id LEFT JOIN work_person wpt ON wpt.id = a.wp_total_id LEFT JOIN work_person wpp ON wpp.id = a.wp_part_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fault_record( id, work_department_id, work_kind_id, work_class_id, car_motor_cycle_id, car_wagon_id, wp_total_id, wp_part_id, run_time, type, description, deal_method, fault_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{workDepartmentId}, #{workKindId}, #{workClassId}, #{carMotorCycleId}, #{carWagonId}, #{wpTotalId}, #{wpPartId}, #{runTime}, #{type}, #{description}, #{dealMethod}, #{faultDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
